00023         struct use_default;
00024 namespace assign{

00026 namespace switch_tag{
00027         struct deduce_put{};
00028 }// switch_tag

00030         struct at_next;
00031     struct insert;
00032     struct push;
00033     struct push_back;

00037     template<>
00038     struct case_<switch_tag::deduce_put,0> :
00039         v2::mpl::wrap<
00040             v2::modifier_tag::insert,
00041             v2::container_type_traits::is_associative
00042         >{};
00043 
00044     template<>
00045     struct case_<switch_tag::deduce_put,1> :
00046         v2::mpl::wrap<
00047             v2::modifier_tag::at_next,
00048             v2::container_type_traits::is_static_array
00049         >{};
00050 
00051     template<>
00052     struct case_<switch_tag::deduce_put,2> :
00053         v2::mpl::wrap<
00054                 v2::modifier_tag::push,
00055             container_type_traits::has_push_deduced_value
00056         >{};
00057 
00058     template<>
00059     struct case_<switch_tag::deduce_put,3> : 
00060         v2::mpl::wrap<v2::modifier_tag::push_back>{};
00061 
00062 }// mpl
00063 namespace put_aux{
00064 
00065     template<typename T>
00066     struct deduce_modifier : v2::mpl::switch_<
00067         v2::switch_tag::deduce_put,
00068         T
00069     >
00070     {};
00071 
00072         struct kwd_deduce{}; 
00073 
00074         template<typename T>
00075     typename T::result_of_modulo::deduce::type
00076         operator%(
00077         T const& t, 
00078         kwd_deduce const& kwd
00079     )
00080     {
00081         return t.modulo_deduce();
00082     }
00083 
00084         template<typename Option1,typename Option2>
00085         struct deduce : boost::mpl::eval_if<
00086         boost::is_same<Option1, boost::use_default>,
00087         boost::mpl::identity<Option2>,
00088         boost::mpl::identity<Option1>
00089         >{};
00090 
00091 }// put_aux

00093         const put_aux::kwd_deduce _deduce = put_aux::kwd_deduce();
